Description: Pair of sandals; woven palm leaf and papyrus.
Curator's comments: Published: Hart, Eyewitness Guides: Ancient Egypt, (1990), p.54. Parkinson and Quirke, Papyrus, (1995), p.12, Fig.2. Veldmeijer, Studies of Ancient Egyptian Footwear. Technological Aspects. Part XVIII. Fibre Composite Sandals, Jaarbericht “ex oriente lux” 44, (2012-2013), pp. 11, 28, fig. 10.
Exhibition history: 2011, 1st Feb - 22nd May. Norwich. Sainsbury Centre for Visual Arts. Basketry: Making Human Nature
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
